title: "Why AI Girlfriends Will Be More Popular Than You Think"
excerpt: "No doubt he’ll eventually get tired of this and want a real girlfriend; it’s not like he prefers AI to the real thing. But right now, the convenience and excitement of all this can’t be beat. The recent release of large language models has unleashed a whole new world of AI girlfriends that communicate like a human."
